text:
Rob Delaney (born January 19, 1977) is an American comedian, actor, writer, and activist. He was the co-star and co-writer of the TV show "Catastrophe". He has appeared in minor roles in blockbuster movies like "Deadpool 2" (2018) and the "Fast & Furious" spin-off "Hobbs & Shaw" (2019).
Delaney was born in Boston, Massachusetts. He studied at New York University. His career began in 2003.
